mapper.sql: select file_id, file_name, file_path, author, reviewer, file_type, file_size, file_status, belongteam, description, update_by, update_time, publish_id from dms_file_info
mapper.select: select sd.dept_name as label, coalesce(count(case when f.belongteam = sd.dept_name then 1 else null end), 0) as file_num from sys_dept sd left join dms_file_info f on f.file_status = 3 where sd.parent_id = 100 group by sd.dept_name

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dms_file_info WHERE file_status = 3 AND update_by = (SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userid})) AS Publish_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dms_file_review WHERE reviewer_id = #{userid} AND is_current = 1 AND status = 1) AS waitReview_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dms_file_publish WHERE publish_id = #{userid} AND is_passed = 1) AS waitPublish_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dms_file_info WHERE file_status = 4 AND update_by = (SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userid})) AS waitModify_num

select sdd.dict_label as label,sdd.dict_value as classified_id, coalesce(count(case when f.file_type = sdd.dict_value then 1 else null end), 0) as file_num from sys_dict_data sdd left join dms_file_info f on f.file_status = 3 where sdd.dict_type = 'dms_file_type' group by sdd.dict_label,sdd.dict_value

WITH RECURSIVE YearRange AS ( SELECT YEAR(CURDATE()) AS year UNION ALL SELECT year - 1 FROM YearRange WHERE year - 1 >= YEAR(CURDATE()) - 4 ) SELECT yr.year AS label, IFNULL(f.file_num, 0) AS file_num FROM YearRange yr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR(f.update_time) AS year, COUNT(*) AS file_num FROM dms_file_info f WHERE f.file_status = 3 GROUP BY YEAR(f.update_time) ) f ON yr.year = f.year ORDER BY yr.year ASC

WITH RECURSIVE MonthRange AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AS month UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(month, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') FROM MonthRange WHERE DATE_SUB(month, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') ) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(yr.month, '%Y-%m') AS label, IFNULL(f.file_num, 0) AS file_num FROM MonthRange yr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(f.update_time, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS file_num FROM dms_file_info f WHERE f.file_status = 3 AND f.update_time >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(f.update_time, '%Y-%m') ) f ON DATE_FORMAT(yr.month, '%Y-%m') = f.month ORDER BY yr.month ASC
